select fc.num, fc.name, fc.project_id, fc.version_id, brc.case_type relateCaseType, brc.id relateId, brc.test_plan_id is not null relatePlanCase, brc.case_id is not null relateCase from bug_relation_case brc join functional_case fc on (brc.case_id = fc.id or brc.test_plan_case_id = fc.id) where brc.bug_id = #{request.bugId} and fc.deleted = false
and fc.name like concat('%', #{request.keyword}, '%')
